Package server.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connection
    This interface implements RMIClientInterface and it will be implemented by the different connection modes
    RMIServerInterface
    RMIClient uses this interface to call RMI_Server methods
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionRMI
    This class communicates with RMIClient using RMIClientInterface
    ConnectionSocket
    This class sends message to Socket_Client
    GameManager
    This class represents the game logic, creates the game and modifies it when the player does an action
    ListOfMaps
    This class reads every file configuration and can create a list of maps
    PrepareDataForClient
    This class reads the state of the game and saves it in different elementary structures as array or variable.
    RMIControllerServer
    This class manages player's connection with RMI mode and then replies to the different things that the client can do This class can send messages to RMI and Socket Client without difference using "connection" of player (Connection is implemented in different way according to the connection type that the player has chosen)
    SocketServer
    This class manages players connect with Socket mode and then receives the message from Socket Client and calls methods in RMI_Server passing the data of messages
